sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; import erc20ExAbi from './ERC20Example.json'; import { getOwnBalance, requestMint, requestMint2, requestBurn, read, tokenName, tokenSymbol } from './Web3Client'; function App() { const [requested, setRequsted] = useState(false); const [balance, setBalance] = useState(0); const [bookmark0, setBookmark0] = useState(0); const [bookmark1, setBookmark1] = useState([]); const [bookmark2, setBookmark2] = useState([]); const [bookmark3, setBookmark3] = useState([]); const [contractInfo, setContractInfo] = useState({ nextAccept: [], IDs: [], amounts: [], isAccepted: [] }); const [contractInfo1, setContractInfo1] = useState({ address: "-", tokenName: "-", tokenSymbol: "-" }); const handleRequestMint = async (e) => { e.preventDefault(); const data = new FormData(e.target); await requestMint2(data.get("gameID"), data.get("amount")); } const handleRequestBurn = async (e) => { e.preventDefault(); const data = new FormData(e.target); await requestBurn(data.get("gameID"), data.get("amount")); } const handleRead = async (e) => { e.preventDefault(); const data = await read(); console.log(data[0]); setBookmark0(bookmark0 => data[0]); setBookmark1(bookmark1 => data[1]); setBookmark2(bookmark2 => data[2]); setBookmark3(bookmark3 => data[3]); } const handleSelect = async (e) => { e.preventDefault(); const data = new FormData(e.target); const provider = new ethers.providers.Web3Provider(window.ethereum); const erc20EX = new ethers.Contract(data.get("tokenAddress"), erc20EXabi, provider); const tokenName = await erc20EX.name(); const tokenSymbol = await erc20EX.symbol(); setContractInfo({ address: data.get("addr"), tokenName, tokenSymbol, }); } const fetchBalance = () => { getOwnBalance() .then((balance) => { setBalance(balance); }) .catch((err) => { console.log(err); }); }; return (

); } export default App;
